name: Chest Simu for Clash Royale
description:
The best Chest Simulator for Clash Royale!

___________________________________
This is not a app to cheat in CR. Its just a simulator for all chest in CR.
You cannot transfer the cards to the real CR.
___________________________________

How many wooden chests do you need to open for a legendary card? With this Chest Simulator you can find out.

What's waiting for you?

● All cards & infos
● All chests (King's, Legendary King's Lighning and Fortune!)
● Real drop chances as in the real game
● All arenas and all seasons
● Open chests to get trophies and reach the highest arena
● Nice animation and sounds
● Fight Simulator
● For the best of gameplay an internet connection is necessary
